A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney has truly destroyed Star Wars. I couldn’t be more upset as a huge fan of the Star Wars universe. There are so many plot holes and such poor character development. The humor in this film is so out of place and the physics of some people and objects is so out of place for the Star Wars universe. There are many moments where situations just didn’t make sense and really won’t grab you in. I will not be going to see the ninth installment after this joke of a Star Wars movie.
